mapper.select: select p.plan_id, p.title, p.content, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.created_at, p.hit, p.theme, m.user_id, m.nickname from plan p join members m on p.user_id = m.user_id order by plan_id desc
select p.plan_id, p.title, p.content, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.created_at, p.hit, p.theme, m.user_id, m.nickname from plan p join members m on p.user_id = m.user_id where p.plan_id = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into plan (title, content, start_date, end_date, user_id, theme) values (#{title},#{content},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{author.userId},#{theme})
insert into plan_places (content_id, plan_id, place_order) values (#{attrNo}, #{planNo}, #{order})
mapper.select: select m.user_id, m.nickname from plan_likes p join members m on p.user_id = m.user_id where p.plan_id = 1;
